background: StreamFlix, a growing media streaming company, needs to build a robust infrastructure to process and deliver video content to millions of users. They require a system that can ingest raw video files, transcode them into multiple formats, store metadata in a scalable database, and manage content delivery efficiently. The system must maintain MPAA (Motion Picture Association of America) compliance standards for content security.
aws_services: ECS Fargate, RDS Aurora PostgreSQL Serverless v2, ElastiCache Redis, EFS, Kinesis Data Streams, API Gateway, Secrets Manager
